colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES SOGS KYIS SMON LAM BTAB PO, ,'DI NI RDO RJE 'CHANG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DPAL POS RDOR 'PHRENG DANG MI TRA'I DBANG RDZOGS PAR GNANG SKABS, ,KUN LA MKHO BAR MTHONG STE SNGAGS RNAMS ZUR DU BKOL BA 'DI NYID LAN RE GNYIS BRJOD NA'ANG PHAN YON SHIN TU CHE ZHING, KHYAD PAR DU LHA TSOGS DE RNAMS KYI DBANG THOB KYANG SGRUB CHOG MANG PO 'DON MI THUB PAS BLA MA LHA RNAMS RJES SU DRAN NAS GSOL BA BTAB CING BYIN RLABS 'BREL BA BRTAN PAR BYA BA'I DON DU MGO 'JUG GI TSOGS BCAD RNAMS KYIS BRGYAN TE BRIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BLO BZANG RGYAL BSTAN MCHOG RIN PO CHE, ,DBYAR GYI RGYA MTSO LTA PHUR 'PHEL 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
